ripple.description: Whether to enable the click water ripple effect
ripple.description_zh: 是否开启点击水波纹效果

ripple-bg-color.description: The background color of the water ripple is valid when ripple is true
ripple-bg-color.description_zh: 水波纹的背景色，ripple为true时有效

type.description: The style type of the button

plain.description: Whether the button is hollowed out and the background color is transparent
plain.description_zh: 按钮是否镂空，背景色透明

hair-line.description: Whether to display a thin border for the button
hair-line.description_zh: 是否显示按钮的细边框

shape.description: The shape of the button is described above
shape.description_zh: 按钮外观形状，见上方说明

loading.description: Whether the button name is preceded by a loading icon
loading.description_zh: 按钮名称前是否带 loading 图标

form-type.description: For <form> components, clicking on them will trigger <form> the submit/reset event for each component
form-type.description_zh: 用于 <form> 组件，点击分别会触发 <form> 组件的 submit/reset 事件

hover-class.description: Specifies the style class to which the button is pressed. When hover-class="none", there is no click-through effect
hover-class.description_zh: 指定按钮按下去的样式类。当 hover-class="none" 时，没有点击态效果

hover-start-time.description: How long after you press and hold it to appear clicked, in milliseconds
hover-start-time.description_zh: 按住后多久出现点击态，单位毫秒

hover-stay-time.description: The retention time of the click state after the finger is released, in milliseconds
hover-stay-time.description_zh: 手指松开后点击态保留时间，单位毫秒

custom-style.description: Custom styles for buttons, object forms, are described above
custom-style.description_zh: 对按钮的自定义样式，对象形式，见上方说明

app-parameter.description: When the APP is opened, the parameters passed to the APP, open-type=launchApp, are valid
app-parameter.description_zh: 打开 APP 时，向 APP 传递的参数，open-type=launchApp时有效

hover-stop-propagation.description: Specifies whether to prevent the native node of the node from being clicked
hover-stop-propagation.description_zh: 指定是否阻止本节点的祖先节点出现点击态

lang.description: Specify the language in which the user information is returned, zh_CN Chinese Simplified, zh_TW Chinese Traditional, EN English
lang.description_zh: 指定返回用户信息的语言，zh_CN 简体中文，zh_TW 繁体中文，en 英文

send-message-title.description: The title of the in-session message card is valid if open-type="contact".
send-message-title.description_zh: 会话内消息卡片标题，open-type="contact"时有效

send-message-path.description: The in-session message card is valid when you click to jump to the path of the Mini Program, open-type="contact".
send-message-path.description_zh: 会话内消息卡片点击跳转小程序路径，open-type="contact"时有效

send-message-img.description: 会话内消息卡片图片,open-type="contact"时有效
send-message-img.description_zh: 会话内消息卡片图片,open-type="contact"时有效

show-message-card.description: Whether to display the in-session message card, set this parameter to true, the user will enter the customer service session will display a prompt of "Mini Program may be sent" in the lower right corner, and the user can quickly send the Mini Program message after clicking, which is valid when open-type="contact".
show-message-card.description_zh: 是否显示会话内消息卡片，设置此参数为 true，用户进入客服会话会在右下角显示"可能要发送的小程序"提示，用户点击后可以快速发送小程序消息，open-type="contact"时有效

throttle-time.description: Throttling interval (no matter how many clicks are made within a certain period of time, only one click event will be triggered), unit, see Throttling and stabilization for details
throttle-time.description_zh: 节流的时间间隔(一定时间内无论点击多少次，只会触发一次click事件)，单位ms，详见节流防抖

events.name: click
events.description: button click, do not use @tap click event, WeChat Mini Program is invalid, and the return value is click event and parameters
events.description_zh: 按钮点击，请勿使用@tap点击事件，微信小程序无效，返回值为点击事件及参数

events.name: getuserinfo
events.description: When the user clicks this button, the obtained user information will be returned, and the value obtained from the detail of the returned parameter is the same as uni.getUserInfo
events.description_zh: 用户点击该按钮时，会返回获取到的用户信息，从返回参数的detail中获取到的值同uni.getUserInfo

events.name: error
events.description: When using open capabilities, an incorrect callback occurs
events.description_zh: 当使用开放能力时，发生错误的回调

events.name: opensetting
events.description: After opening the authorization settings page and closing the callback
events.description_zh: 在打开授权设置页并关闭后回调

events.name: launchapp
events.description: OPEN THE CALLBACK FOR APP SUCCESS
events.description_zh: 打开 APP 成功的回调
